captions.text: Love that was once passionate
I got used to it weakly
Everyone says people are like that
Love burns out as if it will give everything
In the dim light
Two of us fell out of love
Love that was once so passionate
gradually got stained like that petal
After dancing in the wind, it faded away
Just like a midsummer night’s dream
Tears that I never wanted
Are standing in front of me before I knew it
Where did you go?
Take me with you even if we’re breaking up
In the vague memories
Two of us struggled to burn
Love that was once so passionate
gradually got stained like that petal
After dancing in the wind, it faded away
Just like a midsummer night’s dream
After a pain like a typhoon passes by
We’re talking again
I love you
Just like a star that flares up gradually
I will dance in the wind
and love you passionately as ever
